name: Super MoonBox 2
description:
Spawn humans and watch them build a colony!

Spawn zombies and watch them attack the colony!

The Sandbox. Game with your own rules!

Play with different weapons! Bombs, grenades, mines and other things to blow everything up!

Build fences to protect the colony from zombies. Zombies attack every night!

Become a zombie leader and destroy all humans colonies!

Every unit has its own profession and does what it likes!

Control any unit in the game and do the job for him!



You can play this Sandbox game offline without wi fi or internet connection!

If you are experiencing any problems, please do get in contact with me here: dev@supermoonbox.com

https://discord.com/invite/q5fHXxX

Leave a feedback or suggestions if you want to see more features and units in this free new zombie game!
